item.description:
My cell is 860-214-2243 if anyone needs to reach me.  It's best to text or leave a message if you call...I suck about answering numbers I don't know :)

 

Alternative rockers 10,000 Maniacs has been active since the early 80s. To date, the band has released thirteen albums and scored a #1 single with "There Are Days" in 1992. 10,000 Maniacs are also well-known for their cover of Roxy Music's "More Than This" and Patti Smith Group's "Because The Night." *Come early. Seating is limited. Must be 21 or older. Times and performers are subject to change.

 

Show starts at 8. See you all there :)

 

Jen
item.name: 10,000 Maniacs @ Wolf's Den
